name: Stray (itch)
description:
You have been stray for a long time since the aftermath.  your only way back home is a spaceship located in the destruction.  Find the time-travel device and use it to reach your desired destination.

Input:

Move: WASD, Sprint: Left Shift, Jump: Space

Grab: Left Mouse Button, Time-Travel: X

Spaceship Input

Move: W, S

Change Movement Type: E

Rotate yaw: A,D, pitch: Numpad 4, Numpad 6, roll: Numpad 2, Numpad 8

Thrust: Numpad 9
